page.title: 17TOURISTS
page.content: MANY TOURISTS COME TO NEWBIGGIN IN THE SUMMER ON BUS TRIPS.THE PEOPLE LIKE TO BE ON THE BEACH WHEN THEY COME FOR THE DAY.THERE ARE MANY THINGS FOR THEM TO DO BECAUSE THERE IS A ICE CREAM SHOP, BINGO,AMUSMENTS.THE CHILDREN LIKE TO PLAY AT THE PARK WHERE THERE ARE SWINGS AND SLIDES .THE PARK IS NOT FAR FROM THE CHURCH POINT AND A LARGE CARAVAN PARK ALSO THE CHILDREN LIKE TO GO TO THE TENNIS COURTS. OLDER PEOPLE LIKE TO GO TO THE BOWLING GREEN.IT COSTS Â£5.oo A YEAR TO JOIN THE BOWLING CLUB THE CHILDREN LIKE TO GO ON THE SAND AND THE ROCKS TO PLAY IN THE POOLS AND CATCH FISH AND CRABS.
